member.name: T:ExtractIconsFromFilesSample.Form1
member.summary:
Author : Check-Kay Wong
the Shared funtion Icon.ExtractAssociatedIcon from System.Drawing.Icon only have one single argument, choosing the first icon from a file. Because the basic extractIcon from Framework.NET don't have enought options, you will need to import and use ExtractAssociatedIcon from Shell32.dll

member.name: P:ExtractIconsFromFilesSample.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
